name: Who ever smelt it - office fart police
name_original: Who ever smelt it - office fart police
description:
Juvenile set in a drab office full of people trying to sneak out a quick fart without anyone noticing. We've HAD IT!  Use your ears and nose to bust the offenders. Don't click on the wrong person. FPS Use stereo speakers/headphones to bust the office farter... Who ever smelt it!

Game by Maine Inventor
